channel.title: Will it have Co-op?
channel.description:
I am new here. Hello there, people!!!
Will the BM have cooperative play mode, such like Sven Coop?
(sorry for the really bad english). :/

item.title: Will it have Co-op?
item.dc:creator: darkone
item.description:
damn I need to remember the map name, one of the hl2 M maps was a simple arena fight, 3 arena’s with progressively harder enemies must beat all 3 to beat the map. between them was better and better weapons… can’t remember the map name.

item.title: Will it have Co-op?
item.dc:creator: killer_monkey
item.description:
darkone:

I am just waiting for some one to port and modify some of hl2 M’s co-op maps cause some of them would be really fun with standard half life enemies.

Give me a name of a map and I’ll do it. Im already remaking a sven coop map so pumping out a quick port should be easy.

Read full topic

item.title: Will it have Co-op?
item.dc:creator: KyuuGryphon
item.description:
Just feel like chiming in (because why not) about co-op - out of boredom I’ve tried loading a few SP maps with maxplayers set to 2 (i.e, so it loads in DM mode), and surprisingly things seem to work pretty well. The biggest issues I’ve seen in trying it are areaportals (the one at the start of Surface Tension gets closed when the “round” starts), level-changes (nonfunctional), and that the game seems to crash around certain NPCs (not sure which exactly, but it seems to be fine around Marines, Vorts, and headcrabs, at least).

I think, at the very least, it’d be possible to make level-changes actually work through SourceMod or some such, so it’s probably only a matter of time until someone devises a way to play co-op SP if it’s not officially supported.

Read full topic

item.title: Will it have Co-op?

item.description:
Best we have right now is: https://decay.half-lifecreations.com/

Its basically a port of the PS2 version, since Decay never got released on PC.

item.title: Will it have Co-op?
item.dc:creator: R34L0RD
item.description:
Fr0z3n:

We’re looking into a form of Co-Op MP. We can’t say what form (MP/SP) it’ll take at the moment, but we are looking into it as a possible future feature.

Great news. You devs are doing a nice job.
